column4: Need some help please: My system will not boot at all after I did something wrong
But I did change permissions on /var
Yes, I am not sure exactly what I did
Is there a way I can diagnose this?
are you able to rescue boot the system?
I am on another Linux install on the computer
Is there a way I can boot from it or diagnose the problem?
Yes I am on the same machine
you're probably going to have to reinstall :(
and don't break it next time ;)
